item.title: Pakistan army says 300 hostages freed from train
item.description: More than 30 militants were killed in the operation, a military spokesperson says.

item.title: Philippines' Duterte in The Hague after ICC arrest over drug war
item.description: Duterte, who led a "drug war" that killed thousands, was arrested for alleged crimes against humanity.

item.title: What we know about Duterte's ICC arrest warrant... in 90 seconds
item.description: The BBC's Anna Holligan reports from The Hague, where former Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte has arrived.

item.title: How could Putin respond to US-Ukraine ceasefire plan?
item.description: The Kremlin is weighing its options following the US-Ukraine proposal for a 30-day ceasefire.

item.title: US envoy in Qatar to join talks on extending fragile Gaza ceasefire
item.description: Negotiators from Israel and Hamas are meeting mediators for the first time since the truce began in January.
